name: Love Live! School Idol Paradise Vol. 1: Printemps Unit
name_original: Love Live! School Idol Paradise Vol. 1: Printemps Unit
description:
Love Live! School Idol Paradise Vol. 1: Printemps Unit is an arcade game developed by DINGO. It was originally released in 2014. Kadokawa Shoten published the game.
You can play Love Live! School Idol Paradise Vol. 1: Printemps Unit on PS Vita.
